name: Louis SCHIAVONE, Appellee v. R.J. AVETA, Individually and t/a Creative Pools, Appellant

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of May, 2014, the order of the Superior Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
